name: jira_assign_issue
description: Assign a Jira issue to a user by their account ID or email. Set assignee to empty to unassign.

parameters.name: assignee_query
parameters.description: User display name or email to search for and assign (leave empty to unassign)

steps.code: const baseUrl = `{{jira_url}}`.replace(/\/$/, ''); const query = `{{assignee_query}}`; let accountId = null; if (query) { const uResp = await fetch(baseUrl + '/rest/api/3/user/search?query=' + encodeURIComponent(query) + '&maxResults=1', { credentials: 'same-origin' }); if (!uResp.ok) throw new Error('User search failed: ' + uResp.status); const users = await uResp.json(); if (users.length === 0) return { success: false, message: 'No user found matching: ' + query }; accountId = users[0].accountId; } const resp = await fetch(baseUrl + '/rest/api/3/issue/{{issue_key}}/assignee', { method: 'PUT', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, credentials: 'same-origin', body: JSON.stringify({ accountId: accountId }) }); if (!resp.ok) { const err = await resp.text(); throw new Error('Assign failed: ' + resp.status + ' ' + err); } return { success: true, key: '{{issue_key}}', assignee: query || 'Unassigned' }
steps.name: result
steps.label: Assign issue via REST API
